long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gameplay
"Hungry Dinosaur Simulator" offers thrilling and challenging gameplay. Here are the key features of the game:

Dinosaur Characters: You will control a massive and hungry dinosaur and can choose from different types of dinosaurs as your character. Each dinosaur has its own characteristics and abilities, such as size, speed, and attack style.

Open World: The game provides an open-world modern city environment where you can freely roam. Explore every corner of the city, search for humans, and unleash your destructive actions.
Destruction and Devouring: Utilize the power and abilities of the dinosaur to destroy buildings, vehicles, and other facilities. Devouring humans is a key focus of the game. Chase and devour fleeing crowds to gain energy and score points.

Missions and Challenges: The game includes various missions and challenges, such as demolishing specific buildings, evading human pursuit, or engaging in intense battles with other dinosaurs. Completing missions unlocks new dinosaur characters and scenes.

Evolution and Upgrades: By devouring humans and completing missions, you can gain experience points and level up your dinosaur. Leveling up unlocks new skills and abilities, making your dinosaur more powerful.

Freedom of Exploration: In addition to missions and challenges, you can freely explore the city, discover hidden secrets, and collect hidden items. Unlock achievements and collectibles to enhance the fun and challenge of the game.
